worldInfo:
1,000 Konnect NFTs launching on Konnect world's
own story are given away for free by Airdrop
You can get the real goods by Konnect NFT card
with opening mystery box given to the winner.
The prize will be Chanel bag, moreover, luxury
goods such as Gucci, Tag Heuer, Thom Browne,
etc. and high-end cosmetics.
Let's get on the journey of Konnect world's own
story with the first NFT of Airdrop, bon voyage
metamaskinfo:
Metamask linkage is essential to get into Konnect
world. You can check the win of the whitelist and
apply for Airdrop raffle.
nftGiftinfo:
1,000 Konnect NFTs launching on Konnect world's
own story are given away for free by Airdrop.
You can get the real goods by Konnect NFT card
with opening mystery box given to the winner.
The prize will be Chanel bag, moreover, luxury
goods such as Gucci, Tag Heuer, Thom Browne,
etc. and high-end cosmetics.
Let's get on the journey of Konnect World's own
story with the first NFT of Airdrop, bon voyage!
konnectslidecontent1:
Konnect is one of many earths in parallel universe,
and Duman species has been living in Konnect
with a highly developed civilization. They have the
technology capable of using an infinite energy by
the material called Konnect from the energy of
the big bang.
konnectslidecontent2: in 1883, meteors made of Konnect fall to the earth. Since the impact, the two earth which had Konnect and not in parallel universe. after that, the one with meteor start to experience siginificant enviroment change due to Konnect's bigbang energy
konnectslidecontent3: The earth, absorb Konnect energy, start to emission more powerful nature energy. this energy affects in good way to the nature and animal, but not for human. The earth with emissioning Konnect energy is no longer fit for human being so that human dissapeard from the earth with less than a year. And a new race DUMAN, came to rule
konnectslidecontent4: On Earth in 2022, an unknown phenomenon suddenly occurs in the sky. all over the earth Something in the shape of a hole in the sky was created. People were surprised and frightened by the phenomenon they saw for the first time. The goverment did not know how to respond. At that time. boxes-shaped things began to fall from a new hole in the sky. People just stared at the sight of numerous boxes flying away.
konnectswipe2: The next story will be updated in May.

notWhiteListUser: Sorry! You were not chosen as a mystery box winner. We’d like to sincerely thank you for your participation! Look out for more chances!
whiteListUserNoHaveBox: Congratulations on winning a mystery box! You can open and view your mystery box on the ‘My Page’ tab starting May 20th, 18:00 KST
whiteListUserHaveBox: You already have received a mystery box
takeReveal: Take It To An External Wallet
eventUnboxingTimeOut: The Mystery Box will be open on Friday, May 20th after 18:00!
eventNFTReceiveTimeOut: You have been given a commemorative NFT representing your participation in Konnect’s first event! We’d like to sincerely thank you for your participation! You can view your NFT through ‘My Page’ starting May 20th, 18:00 KST

shippingAfterMintingNoti: External wallet transmission is required to request delivery of card results. Please proceed with external wallet transfer
shippingClaimDisableNoti: You can request for delivery after the entire minting schedule is over. Keep yourself updated with the Telegram community for detailed notices!
noti: 가상과 현실을 잇-다, 커넥트(Konnect) 입니다. 현재 미스터리 박스 오픈과 민팅 최종 작업이 반영 중입니다. 사이트 접속량이 많아 잠시 지연된 점 양해부탁드리며, 안정적인 마무리 후 [22시]에 박스개봉이 가능하실 예정입니다. 오래 기다려주신 Konnect 유저분들 조금만 더 기다려주시면 감사하겠습니다.
voucherCreateCall: The external wallet transfer request has been completed. Please proceed to 'Take it to an external wallet'
